name: css-spec-colors
description: A JSON with all CSS color keywords and their corresponding values in hex, RGB and HSL. Color list generated from W3C spec (https://www.w3.org/TR/css-color-4/#named-colors).

scripts.build: rimraf dist/* && node ./src/build.js && cp dist/colors.json docs/colors.json

author: Aarón García Hervás <aarongarciahervas@gmail.com> (https://aarongarciah.com)
